definitions.definition: ( intransitive ) To perform bizarre and unpleasant feats as part of a carnival .
( intransitive , colloquial ) To enthusiastically engage in geek-like or nerdy interests.
examples: It was our first time at a Star Trek convention and we had an amazing time wandering around and geeking .

definitions.definition: ( intransitive , African-American Vernacular , slang ) To be nervous or hyperactive due to using crack cocaine .

subdefinitions.definition: ( by extension , intransitive , African-American Vernacular , slang ) To be under the influence of a mood - altering drug .

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To perform bizarre and unpleasant feats as part of a carnival .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , colloquial ) To enthusiastically engage in geek-like or nerdy interests.
( intransitive , African-American Vernacular , slang ) To be nervous or hyperactive due to using crack cocaine .

definitions.definition: To look ; to peep ; to stare about intently.

main_definition: ( Cornwall ) To look ; to peep ; to stare about intently.
